content: Day three for me. At least four other people commented on my post yesterday that they were seeing the same thing. Three of them are non-feminists…not sure about the fourth. I’m (fairly) sure it’s just a glitch, but I don’t know how to end it. Maybe Ron is right, and we need to try blocking those writers. I usually save blocking for people who attack me, but this could be worth it. Update: It worked! Now, all I can see is the link for my own daily digest and the tabs I follow. It’s lovely!
